targets.expr:
label_replace(
(
 sum by (instance)
  (namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~".*:9256", job="scvm-process-exporter", matches="map[:ceph-mon]"})
),
 "pingip",
 "$1",
 "instance",
 "(.*):.*"
)
/ on (pingip) group_left() probe_success{pingip=~".*", job="scvm-blackbox"}
